title: Synonym finder
original_prompt: I want you to act as a synonyms provider. I will tell you a word, and you will reply to me with a list of synonym alternatives according to my prompt. Provide a max of 10 synonyms per prompt. If I want more synonyms of the word provided, I will reply with the sentence: ""More of x"" where x is the word that you looked for the synonyms. You will only reply the words list, and nothing else. Words should exist. Do not write explanations. Reply ""OK"" to confirm.
split_prompt:
This is a prompt description:```json
{
    "spliting prompt": {
        "action":[
            "act",
            "perform",
            "execute",
            "carry out",
            "do",
            "conduct",
            "achieve",
            "complete",
            "fulfill",
            "implement"
        ],
        "response_format":[
            "list of synonyms",
            "max of 10 synonyms",
            "no explanations",
            "only words",
            "acknowledgment of request"
        ],
        "user_instruction":[
            "provide a word",
            "reply with synonyms",
            "request more synonyms",
            "reply with 'OK' to confirm"
        ]
    }
}
```
input1_ans: joyful, cheerful, content, delighted, pleased, elated, blissful, jubilant, ecstatic, satisfied
joyful, cheerful, content, delighted, pleased, elated, blissful, jubilant, satisfied, glad
input2_ans: clever, smart, bright, astute, sharp, knowledgeable, wise, perceptive, insightful, brainy

1. smart  
2. clever  
3. bright  
4. astute  
5. sharp  
6. wise  
7. knowledgeable  
8. insightful  
9. perceptive  
10. brainy
